alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 5:15PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson Davis and southeastern Calcasieu Parishes through 545 PM CST... At 515 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holmwood, or near Iowa, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Jennings, Welsh, Iowa, Fenton, Pine Island, Holmwood, Lacassine and Roanoke. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 39 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for southwestern Louisiana.
